mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT C.CH_NO , GO.CATEGORY_NAME , C.CH_TITLE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CH_START_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')||'~'||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CH_END_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DAY , CASE WHEN SYSDATE < TO_DATE(C.CH_START_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN '진행예정' WHEN SYSDATE > TO_DATE(C.CH_END_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN '진행완료' ELSE '진행중' END AS CH_STAT_NAME , C.MEMBER_ID FROM TB_CHALLENGE C JOIN TB_CATEGORY GO ON C.CATEGORY_NO = GO.CATEGORY_NO )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT C.CH_NO , GO.CATEGORY_NAME , C.CH_TITLE , CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CH_START_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CH_END_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CH_START_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CH_START_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ~ ' || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CH_END_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') END AS DAY , CASE WHEN SYSDATE < TO_DATE(C.CH_START_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN '진행예정' WHEN SYSDATE > TO_DATE(C.CH_END_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN '진행완료' ELSE '진행중' END AS CH_STAT_NAME , C.MEMBER_ID , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CH_NO) AS ROW_NUM FROM TB_CHALLENGE C JOIN TB_CATEGORY GO ON C.CATEGORY_NO = GO.CATEGORY_NO ) WHERE ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{offset} AND #{limit}
